A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't even begin to describe how bad this movie turned out to be. You don't need to watch this movie twice to see if you like it or not. Too many plot holes in this movie. Things didn't make sense in this movie. Leia having powers that up and arises all of a sudden\, Snoke and his background. How did he survive since the Clone Wars? How did he learn the lighting ability? I just hope to God the next movie wont be full of it like this one is...
